system.requirement: If you wield an atlatl, a wooden shaft to launch long, narrow darts...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} from a short distance, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} +iron instead of +edge. If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} to inflict devastating harm, add +1 and inflict +1 harm. Then, suffer -1 supply.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.8d90dd472856be27]{Resupply} by hunting big game, choose your approach.

  • Careful aim: Add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
  • Alpha strike: Take +1 supply on a hit.
